long_description: The Mombasa Travel Outback Travel Net is a light, inexpensive way to protect yourself from mosquitoes. Rectangular net hangs from 4 or 6 suspension points; use a tree or other suitable object. Green color blends into the outdoors. Synthetic cord and instructions included. Comes in a plastic storage bag. Please note: this net does not keep biting midges (no-see-ums) out.
short_description: The Mombasa Travel Outback Travel Net is a light, inexpensive way to protect yourself from mosquitoes.
